short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Format a list of values for Salesforce SOQL queries. Features include formatting, duplicate removal, and multi-language support.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your list of values into Salesforce SOQL-compatible format instantly. Perfect for IN clause queries and data filtering.

SOQL List Formatter is a powerful Chrome extension designed specifically for Salesforce developers and administrators who frequently work with SOQL queries. This tool streamlines your workflow by instantly converting lists of values into SOQL-compatible format.

üîë Key Features:
‚Ä¢ One-click formatting of multiple values
‚Ä¢ Support for single and multi-line input
‚Ä¢ Automatic quote wrapping and comma separation
‚Ä¢ Copy to clipboard with a single click
‚Ä¢ Keyboard shortcuts for faster workflow
‚Ä¢ Clean, intuitive interface
‚Ä¢ Support for multiple languages (English, Italian, Spanish, French)

‚ú® Perfect for:
‚Ä¢ Building IN clause queries
‚Ä¢ Filtering multiple records
‚Ä¢ Data migration tasks
‚Ä¢ Report customization
‚Ä¢ Quick data analysis

üí° How it works:
1. Paste your list of values (one per line)
2. Click 'Format' or use Ctrl+Enter
3. Get your SOQL-ready formatted list
4. Copy and use in your Salesforce query

‚ö° Time-saving benefits:
‚Ä¢ Eliminates manual formatting
‚Ä¢ Reduces syntax errors
‚Ä¢ Speeds up query building
‚Ä¢ Improves productivity

üõ°Ô∏è Privacy & Security:
‚Ä¢ Works entirely in your browser
‚Ä¢ No data transmission
‚Ä¢ No external dependencies
‚Ä¢ No data storage

Whether you're a Salesforce developer working on complex queries or an administrator building reports, SOQL List Formatter makes your data preparation tasks faster and error-free.

üîÑ Regular updates and support provided to ensure compatibility with the latest Salesforce requirements.
